title: Anyone else have issues with Project hat
body: I purchased the Project bundle with the shirt, hat, mouse pad, etc. As you can see in the pic, the logo is REALLY crooked and makes the hat look like crap. I sent in a ticket last week the day I got the package, but nobody as replied. Can anyone help with this please and thank you?

replies.body:
Since this is a merch issue that will require looking into your specific order and such, your best bet is to remain patient while one of our merch specialists gets back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
